name: CIA.COM
description:
CIA Token is the utility token powering CIA.COM, a Web3 email marketplace that enables users to buy, sell, and trade secure blockchain-based email addresses. Built on the Solana blockchain, CIA Token facilitates transactions within the platform, ensuring decentralized ownership of digital identities. The project is backed by CIA.COM Labs LLC, a registered U.S. entity, with a core team of experienced financial and technology professionals.

With 750 million tokens locked in vested contracts on Magna.so, multi-sig governance, and a fully funded liquidity pool (100% locked), the tokenomics are designed for long-term stability and adoption. Unlike speculative meme projects, CIA Token has a defined utility, integrating directly into a live Web3 application.

Users can register @cia.com email addresses, verify on-chain ownership, and securely trade digital identities, opening a new market for Web3-native communication. Future integrations will expand functionality, allowing seamless authentication and messaging solutions for blockchain applications, DAOs, and enterprises.

With a transparent financial structure, locked liquidity, and long-term governance mechanisms, CIA Token aims to set a new standard for Web3 identity management and decentralized communication.
